product_name: Smith Parallel Max Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The versatile Smith Parallel Max polarized interchangeable sunglasses include a selection of lenses for any light and feature oversized coverage for great protection when running, cycling or paddling.
